conclusion: Need to analyze the image and understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
Image shows colored rectangular blocks labeled A to D and container shapes labeled E and F with arrows indicating flow direction.
Arrows labeled A, B, C, and D indicate the direction of flow through the baffles.
Liquid will flow from A to E based on the arrow direction.
Liquid will flow from B to F based on the arrow direction.
Liquid will flow from C to F based on the arrow direction.
Liquid will flow from D to E based on the arrow direction.
Liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
